flawed_nl_solution:
Tom will be 30 in 5 years so now he is 30-5 = <<30-5=25>>25
2 years ago Tom was 25-2 = <<25-2=32>>32
At that time, Jared was twice as old as Tom so Jared was 32*2 = 64
Two years have since passed so Jared is now 64+2 = <<64+2=66>>66
#### 66

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 23, not 32. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
